body:
I don't see what the problem is, the header provided by the Gutenberg server is:
```
The Project Gutenberg EBook of The Adventures of Tom Sawyer, Complete by
Mark Twain (Samuel Clemens)

This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost
no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use
it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this
eBook or online at www.gutenberg.net
```

The sentence blatantly says "You many copy it", which is exactly what's done.
